"Defiler of the Royalty! Eyahhhh!" Inferno exclaimed.  He took aim 
with his right gun and launched a rocket at the leader just before 
landing on the ground.  

--- In nbwrpg@yahoogroups.com, "Airly" <airly2002@h...> wrote:
> TrOOPERS:
> 
> The troopers laught aloud for a short while and the leader shut 
down them, and getting that the bot that he was carying wasthe one 
that he liked, replied "Or what?"
>   ----- Original Message ----- 
>   From: CatMaster o 
>   To: nbwrpg@yahoogroups.com 
>   Sent: Monday, July 18, 2005 11:54 PM
>   Subject: Re: The benefits of being Techno-organic
> 
> 
>   Flying high above the sky with his gaze searching the Earth his 
eyes 
>   widened with a gasp as he saw the goal of his search. After 
>   countless weeks of searching and searching the ant drone finally 
>   found it.  The reason for his being.  The royalty.  
>   He dove from the heavens to intercept the trooper.
>   "Surrender the Queen!" Inferno called out to those down below as 
he 
>   drew his twin guns to be ready for a battle.
